attributes.action: Bring forward the next general election
attributes.additional_details: It's wrong that British taxpayers who have payed into the system and especially the elderly don't get a fair deal yet immigrants get money thrown at them..free dental treatment, prescriptions, operations and now a free house. There's British people who can't get a council house or afford to buy these are the people the government should be helping not immigrants who we know nothing about. The government should be ashamed for not doing more for British citizens. It used to be GREAT Britain and now it's......?
attributes.background: By the next election in 2029 the country will be drowning in illegal immigrants. We as British citizens should have a say in who comes into the UK. Why should we be paying for immigrants?? Let's vote now and send the boats back.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
